body.data:
SELECT 
    c.MATRICULA,
    c.NOME,
    c.NOME_GUERRA,
    b.CODUSUR,
    f.CODIGO       AS CODFILIAL,
    f.RAZAOSOCIAL  AS NOMEFILIAL,
    g.SIGLA        AS ESTADO,
    CASE
        WHEN c.NOME IS NULL OR c.SENHABD IS NULL THEN 'SENHA NULA'
        ELSE DECRYPT(c.SENHABD, UPPER(TRIM(c.NOME_GUERRA)))
    END AS SENHA
FROM PCEMPR c
LEFT JOIN PCUSUARI b ON c.CODUSUR = b.CODUSUR
LEFT JOIN PCFILIAL f ON b.CODFILIAL = f.CODIGO
LEFT JOIN TAB_GRUPOFILIAL g ON f.CODIGO = g.CODFILIAL
WHERE c.NOME_GUERRA = '{{ Input_email.text.toUpperCase() }}'
